name: Hunted In Space: Return To Utorone
name_original: Hunted In Space: Return To Utorone
description: Play as a lone miner who has strayed too far from his home planet, Utorone. Return to Utorone as soon as possible while the enemy chases you down but wait you have limited fuel and it's definitely not enough to return. Guess you no longer have a choice but to use your knowledge of asteroid fuel extraction.
